OpenSim.Services.Interfaces.IGridRegistrationService Interface Reference

This is the main service that collects URLs for registering clients. Call this if you want to get secure URLs for the given SessionID. More...

Inheritance diagram for OpenSim.Services.Interfaces.IGridRegistrationService:

List of all members.

void UpdateUrlsForClient (string SessionID)
 Updates the time so that the region does not timeout.

Properties

float ExpiresTime [get]
 Time before handlers will need to reregister (in hours).

Detailed Description

This is the main service that collects URLs for registering clients. Call this if you want to get secure URLs for the given SessionID.
